Class LandingGear

  • java.lang.Object
    • LandingGear
  • public class LandingGear
extends Object
    This class models the Wheel Structure of the Airplane with 3 WheelSTruts (nose, left and right) with some wheels. Also, you can check that everything is safe to use

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static boolean LEVER_DOWN
      It's the value representing that the lever is down
      static boolean LEVER_UP
      It's the value representing that the lever is up

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LandingGear()
      Default constructor to create a LandingGear that assigns the METRIC_WHEEL_SIZE to the size of the wheels of all the struts (nose have 2 wheels, left 3 and right 4).
      LandingGear​(double size)
      Constructor to create a LandingGear that assigns a given size as the size of the wheels of all the struts (nose have 2 wheels, left 3 and right 4).
      LandingGear​(double size, boolean lever)
      Constructor for objects of class LandingGear that allows the user to set the size of the wheels of all the struts and if the lever is down or up.
      LandingGear​(int numberOfWheels, double size)
      Constructor for objects of class LandingGear that allows to set the size of the wheels of all the struts.
      LandingGear​(int numberOfWheels, double size, boolean lever)
      Constructor for objects of class LandingGear that allows the user to set the size of the wheels of all the struts and if the lever is down or up.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void activeHardLandingConfiguration()
      Activates the Hard Landing Configuration of the Airplane only if it's flying, so all strut are deployed and the pressure of the wheels is set to 75% of the wheel size
      protected WheelStrut getLeft()
      Returns the value of all the fields of the left strut.
      boolean getLever()
      Returns the value of the lever
      protected WheelStrut getNose()
      Returns the value of all the fields of the nose strut.
      protected WheelStrut getRight()
      Returns the value of all the fields of the right strut.
      boolean isConsistent()
      Checks if the struts are deployed when the lever is down, and retracted if the lever is up.
      boolean isOperational()
      Checks if all the wheels of the WheelStruts are operational (checks the pressure of them).
      void print()
      Prints a message with the state of the lever and if it is safe to use the airplane.
      double reviewPressure​(double basePressure)
      Verifies that the pressure of each wheel of every strut is within the range [basePressure-Wheel.THRESHOLD; basePressure+Wheel.THRESHOLD].
      void setLever​(boolean lever)
      Sets a new given value for the lever field.
      String toString()
      Returns a text with the state of the lever and if it is safe to use the airplane.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LandingGear

        public LandingGear()
        Default constructor to create a LandingGear that assigns the METRIC_WHEEL_SIZE to the size of the wheels of all the struts (nose have 2 wheels, left 3 and right 4). It creates the 3 struts deployed and sets the lever down

      • LandingGear

        public LandingGear​(double size)
        Constructor to create a LandingGear that assigns a given size as the size of the wheels of all the struts (nose have 2 wheels, left 3 and right 4). It creates the 3 struts deployed and sets the lever down
        Parameters:
        size - It's the size for the wheels

      • LandingGear

        public LandingGear​(int numberOfWheels,
                   double size)
        Constructor for objects of class LandingGear that allows to set the size of the wheels of all the struts. It creates the 3 struts deployed and sets the lever down
        Parameters:
        numberOfWheels - It's the number of wheels that each wheelStrut will have
        size - It's the size for the wheels

      • LandingGear

        public LandingGear​(double size,
                   boolean lever)
        Constructor for objects of class LandingGear that allows the user to set the size of the wheels of all the struts and if the lever is down or up. It creates the 3 struts.
        Parameters:
        size - It's the size for the wheels
        lever - It's the value for the lever field (up or down)

      • LandingGear

        public LandingGear​(int numberOfWheels,
                   double size,
                   boolean lever)
        Constructor for objects of class LandingGear that allows the user to set the size of the wheels of all the struts and if the lever is down or up. It creates the 3 struts.
        Parameters:
        numberOfWheels - It's the number of wheels that each wheelStrut will have
        size - It's the size for the wheels
        lever - It's the value for the lever field (up or down)

    • Method Detail

      • reviewPressure

        public double reviewPressure​(double basePressure)
        Verifies that the pressure of each wheel of every strut is within the range [basePressure-Wheel.THRESHOLD; basePressure+Wheel.THRESHOLD]. Except for the nose strut, that they must be reviewed for basePressure+15 If so, the wheel pressure is correct, and remains unmodified. If don't, the pressure in the wheel will be updated to the basePressure. If the basePressure is negative, the pressure won't update it and a error message will appear
        Parameters:
        basePressure - It's the pressure taken to check if the pressure of the wheel is in range
        Returns:
        The sum of the pressure of the wheel in the landing gear

      • setLever

        public void setLever​(boolean lever)
        Sets a new given value for the lever field. If the lever is set to down, all the struts will be deployed. If it's set to up, all the struts will be retracted
        Parameters:
        lever - It's the new given value of the lever field

      • getLever

        public boolean getLever()
        Returns the value of the lever
        Returns:
        The value of the lever

      • isConsistent

        public boolean isConsistent()
        Checks if the struts are deployed when the lever is down, and retracted if the lever is up.
        Returns:
        True if the landing gear is consistent and safe (the struts have the correct position)

      • isOperational

        public boolean isOperational()
        Checks if all the wheels of the WheelStruts are operational (checks the pressure of them).
        Returns:
        True if all the WheelStruts are operational (the pressure of every wheel is OK)

      • activeHardLandingConfiguration

        public void activeHardLandingConfiguration()
        Activates the Hard Landing Configuration of the Airplane only if it's flying, so all strut are deployed and the pressure of the wheels is set to 75% of the wheel size

      • getNose

        protected WheelStrut getNose()
        Returns the value of all the fields of the nose strut. It's only use for testing purposes
        Returns:
        All the values of the fields of the nose strut

      • getLeft

        protected WheelStrut getLeft()
        Returns the value of all the fields of the left strut. It's only use for testing purposes
        Returns:
        All the values of the fields of the left strut

      • getRight

        protected WheelStrut getRight()
        Returns the value of all the fields of the right strut. It's only use for testing purposes
        Returns:
        All the values of the fields of the right strut

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a text with the state of the lever and if it is safe to use the airplane. -Status: ON (everything is OK) | FAILURE (the landing gear is not consistent or at leastone strut isn't operational) -Strut (Nose,Left,Right): ON (the strut is deployed)|OFF (the strut is retracted) | PRESS (there isn't enough pressure on at least one wheel)
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        A text with the state of the airplane and where is the problem

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints a message with the state of the lever and if it is safe to use the airplane. -Status: ON (everything is OK) | FAILURE (the landing gear is not consistent or at leastone strut isn't operational) -Strut (Nose,Left,Right): ON(the strut is deployed)|OFF(the strut is retracted) | PRESS (there isn't enough pressure on at least one wheel)
